title: Amber Gill reveals her radiant make-up free complexion as she and India Reynolds arrive in London
text:
They are the newly single Love Islanders who recently enjoyed a wild trip to Paris.

And Amber Gill and India Reynolds looked delighted as they arrived back in London after their brief break in France on Wednesday.

Love Island champion Amber, 22, showcased her radiant complexion and natural beauty by going make-up free as she strolled through Kings Cross station.

Comeback: Amber Gill and India Reynolds looked delighted as they arrived back in London after their brief break in France on Wednesday

The star - who split from Greg O'Shea in August- looked chic in a navy checked shirt and leather leggings, which emphasised her lean legs.

She paired this with a fluffy white jacket and leather boots.

India, 28, who recently announced her split from fellow Love Island finalist Ovie Soko, 28, opted for a comfortable look in a black slogan print hoodie.

She wore this with black joggers, box fresh trainers and a leather handbag.

Stroll: Love Island champion Amber, 22, showcased her radiant complexion and natural beauty by going make-up free as she strolled through Kings Cross station

Brave face: India, 28, who recently announced her split from fellow Love Island finalist Ovie Soko, 28, opted for a comfortable look in a black slogan print hoodie

Her raven locks were styled in soft waves while a rich palette of make-up enhanced her gorgeous features.

Earlier this month, India and basketball player Ovie shocked fans as news about their split emerged, after four months of dating.

Despite admitting their break-up has been 'difficult', the boohoo model joked she hopes her DMs will be 'a bit more full' now she's single again.

Speaking on the red carpet at the Pride Of Britain Awards at London's Grosvenor House Hotel on Monday night, she said: 'Maybe they'll [DMs] be a bit more full now.

'I feel like I've been dropped back in the ocean. We'll see. I'm lucky, I've got a really close group of girlfriends, they've been really looking after me.'

Newly-single: The night before the Love Islanders amped up the glamour as they attended the boohooMAN x Dadju event

'Greg, who?' In an exclusive interview with MailOnline, the former beautician, 22, insisted she has no plans on rekindling her relationship with ex Greg O'Shea, 24 (pictured in August)

Speaking about the split, India shared: 'Obviously it's difficult, but any break-up is difficult. It's even more difficult when it's in front of the rest of the world, but I'll be fine.'

The couple hadn't managed to see each other for six weeks in the lead-up to their split, but narrowly avoided a run-in on the red carpet at the ceremony.

While Amber and Greg became the fastest winners to part ways in the show's history as they split after just five weeks together.

When asked about the Irish rugby player in an exclusive interview with MailOnline earlier this month, the curly-haired bombshell defiantly said: 'Um… who? I don’t know who you’re talking about!

'No I’m joking, I don’t keep in contact with him. I don’t think [rekindling] the romance is on the cards.'
description: Amber Gill and India Reynolds looked delighted as they arrived back in London after their brief break in France on Wednesday.
